backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to remove the PositionEntryForm component from DashboardTab.tsx while keeping the file itself, with high confidence and test ID REQ-93.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their roles, key exports, and notable implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens including colors, borders, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Crypto Position Monitor PWA, including manifest link, theme color, Apple touch icon, and mobile web app meta tags.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for Crypto Position Monitor defining app name, icons, display mode, theme colors, categories, and an 'Add Position' shortcut.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets, network-first for HTML and Binance API calls, with install/activate lifecycle cache management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab navigation, position storage, monitoring, and portfolio exposure, rendering Dashboard, AI Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management tabs, and a settings dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdjustmentSugges: Displays an AI-generated stop-loss or take-profit adjustment suggestion with current vs. proposed levels, confidence badge, and accept/dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSec: Collapsible section component that fetches AI-generated daily trades via React Query, monitors live prices, and renders trade cards with loading skeletons and a force-refresh option.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSum: Displays a summary panel for today's AI trading portfolio, showing total PnL (USD and %), winning/losing trade counts, and the number of reversal guard activations pulled from trade history storage.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesTab: A simple tab layout component that renders the AIDailyTradesSection and PerformanceComparisonPanel side by side in a vertical stack.
frontend/src/components/AIInsightsTab.ts: Renders AI insights for open positions, including sentiment gauges, trend predictions, and dismissible adjustment suggestions; shows an empty state when no positions exist.
frontend/src/components/AITradeCard.tsx: A detailed card component for a single AI trade, displaying modality, risk management step progress, TP/SL levels, PnL, reversal guard status, and a live-trading toggle with order state.
frontend/src/components/BinanceCredentia: A settings panel for entering, saving, clearing, and testing Binance API credentials, with connection status feedback and timeout handling.
frontend/src/components/CredentialStatus: A memoized badge indicator that reactively shows whether Binance API credentials are saved and whether live trading mode is active, listening to custom DOM events for updates.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx: Renders the main dashboard tab with a capital summary, open positions list, and a button to import live positions from Binance when credentials are available.
frontend/src/components/ExposureChart.ts: Displays two cards showing asset allocation percentages and long/short balance as progress bars based on provided exposure and capital data.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Renders a PWA install button that triggers the native install prompt if available, or shows a manual instructions modal otherwise; hidden when already installed.
frontend/src/components/InstallInstructi: Shows a dialog with step-by-step PWA installation instructions for multiple browsers (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox) on both mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/LiveRiskMetricsC: Fetches live prices and leverage bracket data from Binance to compute and display per-position liquidation prices, distances, and risk levels (safe/warning/danger).
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingBanne: Displays an amber warning banner when live trading is active, reactively updating via custom DOM events without requiring a page reload.
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingToggl: Provides a toggle switch to enable/disable live trading mode, showing a confirmation dialog before activation and enforcing a 20-second timeout safety cutoff.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceCompa: Renders a side-by-side performance comparison panel between AI trades and user trades, displaying metrics like win rate, PnL, and trade counts sourced from local storage utilities.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioExposur: Displays a portfolio exposure dashboard card showing total capital deployed, capital at risk, live unrealized PnL, and live exposure, with support for enriched live-price positions.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Renders an individual trading position card with PnL display, TP/SL proximity alerts, AI insights collapsible section, adjustment suggestions, and a trade outcome modal triggered on deletion.
frontend/src/components/PositionDashboar: Displays the list of active trading positions by fetching live price data via a monitoring hook and rendering a PositionCard for each, with loading, error, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/PositionEntryFor: Provides a form for manually entering a new trading position, fetching historical klines to auto-calculate take-profit levels and stop-loss before submitting the constructed position object.
frontend/src/components/PositionSizeCalc: A React component that calculates optimal position sizes based on capital, risk percentage, entry/stop-loss prices, and leverage, with live Binance price fetching and leverage bracket validation.
frontend/src/components/RiskManagementTa: A tab layout component that composes LiveRiskMetricsCard, PositionSizeCalculator, PortfolioExposureDashboard, and ScenarioSimulator into a unified risk management view, conditionally rendering exposure data based on whether positions exist.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioSimulato: A component that simulates portfolio P&L under user-defined or ATR-based price change scenarios, fetching live prices and kline data from Binance to enrich positions before running the simulation.
frontend/src/components/SentimentGauge.t: Displays a market sentiment card for a given symbol showing bullish/bearish/neutral score, strength percentage, and contributing indicator factors sourced from the useSentimentAnalysis hook.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: A modal dialog with three tabs for configuring Binance API credentials, enabling live trading mode, and setting total capital for risk calculations.
frontend/src/components/StopLossRecommen: Renders a stop-loss recommendation card showing the stop price, distance from current price, max loss in USD/percent, capital risk, reasoning, and a partial-taking strategy alert.
frontend/src/components/TabNavigation.ts: A sticky top navigation bar that renders four app tabs (Dashboard, AI Daily Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management) with active-state highlighting and responsive label truncation.
frontend/src/components/TakeProfitRecomm: Renders a list of take-profit level cards for a trading position, showing target price, distance from current price, expected profit, and whether each level has been reached.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalInpu: A form card component that lets users enter and save their total trading capital to local storage, with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalSumm: Displays a summary card of total, deployed, available, and at-risk capital across all positions, with inline editing support and reactivity to capital changes via a custom DOM event.
frontend/src/components/TradeOutcomeModa: A dialog modal for closing a position by recording its outcome (TP hit, SL hit, or manually closed) and exit price, then computing and saving the resulting PnL as a trade history record.
frontend/src/components/TrendPredictionC: Displays AI-generated short-term and medium-term trend predictions (direction and confidence) for a given symbol using the useTrendPrediction hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes due to identity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdjustmentSuggesti: Fetches recent hourly kline data from Binance for each position and generates trade adjustment suggestions, refreshing every 30 seconds.
A React Query hook that generates AI trades for each trading modality, optionally placing live Binance market, take-profit, and stop-loss orders with per-call timeouts, and persists trades to local storage.
Polls current prices for AI trades and updates trade state (TP/SL execution, reversal detection, risk management steps) via React Query, persisting changes to localStorage and optionally placing live Binance orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useAITradeStorage.ts: Provides CRUD helpers for persisting AI daily trades in localStorage, applying default values for execution-state fields and checking whether initial trade generation is needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: Fetches and caches the list of Binance perpetual futures pairs via React Query with a 1-hour stale time.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, delegation validation, and status tracking, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveTradingMode.ts: Manages live trading toggle state, validating Binance API credentials with a timeout before enabling, and syncing state via custom window events.
Enriches portfolio positions with live Binance prices to compute live exposure, unrealized PnL, liquidation price, and distance to liquidation, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionMonitoring: React Query hook that polls current prices for all tracked positions every 5 seconds and computes PnL, distance to TP1, and distance to stop-loss for each.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionStorage.ts: Hook managing position persistence in localStorage with optional live order placement (market, TP, SL) via Binance Futures API when live trading is enabled, using per-order timeouts and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability and installation state by listening to browser beforeinstallprompt and appinstalled events, and exposes an install trigger function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder/empty module acknowledging that no backend canister is used; all data operations go directly to Binance APIs.
React Query hook that fetches 100 hourly klines from Binance Futures and runs a sentiment analysis utility, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrendPrediction.ts: React Query hook that fetches hourly and daily klines from Binance Futures and returns short-term and medium-term trend predictions, refreshing every 5 minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet configuring Tailwind base/components/utilities, defining a golden OKLCH color theme with light and dark mode CSS variables, and adding PWA/utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/services/binanceApi.ts: Service module wrapping Binance USD-M Futures public REST endpoints for fetching perpetual pairs, current prices, ticker prices, leverage brackets, and OHLCV klines.
frontend/src/services/binanceOrderServic: Service module for placing signed Binance Futures orders (market, take-profit, stop-loss) using HMAC-SHA256 via Web Crypto API with a configurable request timeout.
frontend/src/services/binancePositionSer: Fetches open USD-M Futures positions from Binance's /fapi/v2/positionRisk endpoint using HMAC-SHA256 signing, then maps the results to the app's internal Position type with placeholder TP/SL values.
frontend/src/types/adjustment.ts: Defines TypeScript types for position adjustment suggestions (take-profit or stop-loss) and their acceptance/dismissal history.
frontend/src/types/aiTrade.ts: Defines types for AI-generated trades including status, trading modality, TP/SL levels, risk management steps, reversal detection state, and an enriched variant with live price and PnL data.
frontend/src/types/binanceApi.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Binance Futures API responses including account info, position risk, orders, leverage brackets, and related enums/types.
frontend/src/types/calculator.ts: Defines input and result types for a position size calculator covering capital, risk percentage, entry/stop prices, leverage, and computed risk/reward metrics.
frontend/src/types/exposure.ts: Defines types for portfolio exposure analysis including per-asset exposure, long/short balance, correlation risk, and aggregate portfolio metrics with warning flags.
frontend/src/types/position.ts: Defines core Position types including take-profit levels, stop-loss recommendations, and a price-enriched variant with PnL and distance-to-TP/SL fields.
frontend/src/types/prediction.ts: Defines types for trend predictions (direction, confidence, time horizon) and their historical records with optional actual outcomes.
frontend/src/types/reversal.ts: Defines types for market reversal detection signals and supporting indicators including RSI divergence, EMA crossover, candlestick patterns, volatility spikes, and support/resistance violations.
frontend/src/types/scenario.ts: Defines types for what-if scenario analysis, including inputs, per-position outcomes (PnL, TP/SL/liquidation hit), aggregate results, and named scenario presets.
frontend/src/types/sentiment.ts: Defines types for market sentiment analysis including a bullish/bearish/neutral score, strength value, and contributing indicator factors.
frontend/src/types/tradeHistory.ts: Defines types for user and AI trade history records, including outcomes, PnL, and performance metrics with optional per-modality breakdowns.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentSuggestions: Generates dynamic TP/SL adjustment suggestions for open positions based on ATR-derived volatility, support/resistance proximity, and price movement analysis.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeHistoryStorage: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD utilities for persisting and retrieving AI trade history records, with duplicate-entry prevention.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeSelection.ts: Selects and constructs AI trade signals for various trading modalities by computing technical indicators (RSI, EMA, ATR, momentum) from Binance kline data and applying per-modality TP/SL multipliers.
frontend/src/utils/binanceAuth.ts: Provides HMAC-SHA256 signing and an authenticated fetch wrapper for the Binance API, enforcing a 15-second timeout and throwing a typed `BinanceApiError` on timeout or failure.
Calculates portfolio exposure metrics (capital deployed, leverage, PnL, long/short balance, correlation risks, and warning flags) from a list of positions with prices.
frontend/src/utils/liveTradingStorage.ts: Manages live trading mode, Binance API credentials, and per-modality live order toggles in localStorage, dispatching deferred custom DOM events on changes.
frontend/src/utils/marketReversalDetecto: Detects market trend reversals by analyzing Binance kline data using RSI divergence, EMA crossovers, candlestick patterns, ATR volatility spikes, and support/resistance violations across modality-specific timeframes.
frontend/src/utils/performanceCalculatio: Computes win rate, total PnL, and performance metrics for user and AI trade records, with per-modality breakdowns for AI trades.
frontend/src/utils/pnlCalculations.ts: Calculates leveraged PnL in USD and percentage for long/short positions, and computes the percentage distance between two price levels.
frontend/src/utils/positionSizeCalculato: Calculates position size, contract count, risk/reward amounts, and risk-reward ratio given capital, risk percentage, stop-loss, entry price, and leverage.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers a service worker, listens for updates with a user confirmation prompt to reload, and schedules hourly update checks.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioSimulator.ts: Defines preset market scenarios (crash, bull run, volatility) and a `simulateScenario` function that projects P&L, TP/SL hits, and liquidation risk for a list of positions given a percentage price change.
frontend/src/utils/sentimentAnalysis.ts: Implements technical indicator calculations (RSI, MACD, EMA, price action, volume trend, momentum) and an `analyzeSentiment` function that aggregates them into a `SentimentAnalysis` result with bullish/bearish factors.
frontend/src/utils/stopLossCalculator.ts: Calculates a recommended stop-loss price and associated loss metrics using ATR, support/resistance levels, and leverage-adjusted risk percentages, returning a `StopLossRecommendation` with reasoning and partial-taking strategy.
Generates three take-profit levels (conservative, moderate, aggressive) for a position by combining volatility, support/resistance levels, and leverage factors, returning an array of `TakeProfitLevel` objects with profit calculations and reasoning.
frontend/src/utils/technicalAnalysis.ts: Provides core technical analysis helpers: ATR calculation, volatility (std dev of returns), support/resistance detection via price clustering, and risk/reward ratio computation.
frontend/src/utils/totalCapitalStorage.t: Manages persistence of total trading capital in localStorage and dispatches a `total-capital-change` custom DOM event on writes to enable reactive UI updates.
frontend/src/utils/tradeHistoryStorage.t: Provides CRUD helpers for persisting user trade records (`UserTradeRecord`) in localStorage, including get, save (append), and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/trendPrediction.ts: Predicts short-term (1–24 hour) and medium-term (1–7 day) price trend direction and confidence using moving averages, momentum, and volatility derived from hourly and daily price arrays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom colors (using oklch variables), border radii, box shadows, accordion animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 51) describing a crypto trading monitoring app built with React/TypeScript/Tailwind, documenting architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features.
